bug.author: ScottishFold007
bug.summary: ConfigurationError: Cannot register evaluate as Subcommand; name already in use for Evaluate

comments.comment: We need more context than this in order to help you. It looks like you've gotten allennlp installed in two places in your environment somehow, because you're running the @Subcommand.register("evaluate") twice.
Closing, as I'm quite confident that this is an environment problem, but feel free to keep commenting if you still have issues.
